overview:
Cloud-Mobile-Social is a talented group of Angels & Experts with a passion for building successful new ventures. It’s about - Winner take all • Disrupt & Reorder • Knowing the right moves.

• We are specialists in idea validation/valuation, business strategy, funding, mobile and social app development, launch, traction, scale and exit. • We exploit social media and create liquidity events. • We seek to improve life, extend technology and expand global social interaction.

Contact us at 1cloudmobilesocial@gmail.com
